website_summaries.verdict: A compact accessory that fits into a back pocket yet opens to a full-size keyboard.
pros: Weighing only 6 oz., this portable model opens like a book to reveal a full-size keyboard with a standard key layout
Expert touch-typists report a seamless adjustment to the split design
cons: Some owners report it drops Bluetooth connections
Keys are less sensitive than on a standard keyboard

customer_reviews.title: I can easily carry it in a pocket of my jeans because ...
customer_reviews.text: Feeling when I push down the keys is so smooth and the response is fast. I can easily carry it in a pocket of my jeans because of the size and weight (it is VERY light), and the size of the keys are almost as big as my Macbook Air's. It took me a while to get used to the layout of the keyboard because of its unique angle. After some practice with brief texts to my family and friends, I got the hang of it and this little thing has become an indispensable gadget to go with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area resident

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keyboard for that internet lumberjack.
customer_reviews.text: What a completely robust and well developed keyboard. Not only is the keyboard spread out for those of us who don't have tiny baby hands, but the keys are nice and clicky-clacky, for that tactile response us manly men enjoy. None of that internet cafe spineless soft rubber buttons here. Turns off when you close it... and battery lasts forever. Three weeks into use with the charge that came in it. 10/10 Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fox M.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and work from the road. This one time, I decided to leave my laptop behind when going on vacation. And then I got an email and had to get something out quickly. I'm at the airport. All I have is my phone. I need to modify a document--too big of a job for a phone, really. I went to every electronics store in the airport and couldn't find a travel bluetooth keyboard. I painstakingly got that document out using my phone but it was awful. Got this and don't leave home without it. Charges quickly, works with my phone and my Surface 4 Pro. Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousVerifiedPurchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great for light travel!
customer_reviews.text: Very good keyboard. Great for light travel with a smart phone or tablet instead of a heavier laptop. Good key feedback once you get used to the layout. Only negative is that sometimes it takes several attempts to pair with your device. Otherwise, very good!
customer_reviews.author: John Labadan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: An excellent portable keyboard. You do not have to adjust your typing like you do with others. All the keys are in the right place. It's thin, pairs easily and works well. I'd take off 1/4 star if I could because I don't love the somewhat diagonal V shape, though I'm sure some think ti's ergonomic. A small pittance of a compromise compared to the other awful versions I have seen, like the I-Clever, where the keys put in poorly thought out places and flat out don't work some times. If you want a portable keyboard, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: SCM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this keyboard compared to the various keyboard cases I've tried for my iPad Air 2. For $30, the quality exceeds that of the Logitech and Belkin keyboard cases - much less plastic-y. With those, my hands were cramped tightly together while the bluetooth connection faded in and out. With this keyboard, the ergonomic design does not put a strain on my hands and the battery lasts even while working on a lengthy essay. I haven't had to re-pair the device after being idle for a while and that's definitely handy. Plus, the fact that the keyboard folds up neatly makes it really portable.
customer_reviews.author: Myla Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, what a great little product. Fits perfectly in a jacket (suit/blazer) pocket. Lightweight. The keys are actually really nice to type on for it's size. The angled ergonomic design might throw some people off, but I'm getting used to it pretty quickly (if you're a "touch typist", you'll easily adapt). I was originally going to buy the Microsoft foldable keyboard - which I have borrowed from a colleague and used before - but for the money, I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: PotatoMandoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice folding design but unregistered keypresses ruin the experience
customer_reviews.text: The design and build of the keyboard is great for the price. When folded, it's slightly larger than a men's wallet and could fit in a back pocket if needed. Pairing is simple, but sadly, my device would randomly not register key presses when typing at speed. Keys had to be pressed harder than the minimal require dto actuate the key, and at times, keys would simply not transmit data to the computer. If this were rare, it may not be a problem. Having to go back and correct one letter in every 1 or 2 sentences is a dealbreaker though. Maybe mine was a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Not a feasible option for regular typing
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a keyboard to really get work done with, this is not it. It looks great, feels great, is the perfect size to travel with but it falls short with quite a bit of lag and stuttering which makes it painful and aggravating to use when typing at full speed. You hit some keys once and two characters appear, then hit backspace to fix it but nothing happens so you try again and then it backspaces three characters. There is way too much time wasted with that constantly happening that you lose focus on what you were working on to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lofgren

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this keyboard for a while, and I've got to say that it's pretty awesome. The best thing about this foldable keyboard is that you can literally fit it in your pocket. I just throw it in my pant pocket with my phone and my wallet, and run. It's great for taking notes in class or blogging on my phone. The only issue I have is that the keys are not as smooth as they could be; and sometimes you need to press a little hard for a key press to register. Otherwise it's a great gadget for productivity.
customer_reviews.author: Raqib Zaman

customer_reviews.title: duplicate keystrokes make typing a huge pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a friend had one like it, but I wonder if I bought the wrong model. This one is just terrible with my macbook, and I now see that there is feedback from others with similar problems. I constantly have to go back and delete duplicate letters that this keyboard has decided to insert. I've also had trouble with key mapping -- the "win" key is supposed to map to command, but doesn't map to anything and can't be mapped to command. I reconfigured to map 'alt' as command, but now I have no option key... Just writing this short comment I have had to go back and delete 6 extra characters. Often it is even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foldable keyboard!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for over a year now & it's still going strong. It's super light yet durable, easy to toss in my bag, the buttons feel surprisingly close to a regular laptop keyboard considering how thin it is, & the battery lasts FOREVER. I've literally only charged it a handful of times since I've gotten it & I use it 5 days/week for several hours each time. Amazing!! My one small gripe is you're supposed to be able to pair it with 2 devices & I've only been able to pair it with one. But at this price I'd just buy another for my other laptop & give it 5 stars anyway. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: MXE

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have an iPad.
customer_reviews.text: So Ive had this for the better part of a year now, heres the review: - Portable as all hell, fits in your back pocket and is about the thickness of a comic book. - Battery will last at least 4-6 hours of pretty constant use. If you let it sit unused for several days it still holds a charge. - I had an Apple wireless keyboard that seriously broke about a week into using it and this little keyboard trumps it. Hint: If the battery starts to die on you, close the key pad in half and reopen it to reset it. It will keep going for another 20 min or so before it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Evan Kriebel

customer_reviews.title: compact, light touch, easy to use, and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought this due to pain in my fingers from using a supposedly soft-touch keyboard. Been using this one for about 3 days and already seeing a lot of relief! Easy to use, extremely compact. Still getting used to the keyboard. The only wish is that I delete using a forward delete which requires a Fn back arrow combination so that is a little clumsy. No - I don't have carpal tunnel (been tested) so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent keyboard, IF it worked all the time.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine when it is connected. Problem is it doesn’t stay connected to iPad. You literally have to turn off the iPad and turn it back on for the keyboard to reconnect. Not good enough for a consistent usage. You literally have to turn off the iPad and turn it back on for the keyboard to reconnect. Not good enough for consistent usage
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: One of the best portable keyboards I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the absolute best portable keyboards I have ever owned or used. The folding on/off mechanism is genius, and the scissor keys feel wonderful to type on. This is the perfect keyboard to pair with an ipad, as you can use the tablet like normal most of the time, and when you need to write out a long email or something just get this out of your bag. It takes up almost no space. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jarmer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the most convenient keyboard I could imagine having. It’s great for those who don’t always need a keyboard attached and have the occasional project that requires a keyboard. It’s so compact I stick it into my tablet sleeve and I am good to go. I have yet to charge it. The battery life is great and can be plugged into a portable changer on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little keyboard! I use this for my Galaxy Tablet and it's great! It's small size makes it totally portable- it fits easiy with my tablet into a bag or tote, and it makes it so much easier to type than using the stylus on the screen. And the shape makes it much easier to use than the tiny straight keyboard I'vebeen using. I heartily recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the hand positioning takes some getting used to. And it sometimes struggles to reconnect with devices that are woken from sleep. And the non-alphanumeric keys are a bit awkwardly placed, and non-sensical to Mac/iOS users, but you can’t beat the compact size for the price. I found the keys very responsive and have not experienced any Bluetooth drop offs while using it. Pretty happy with this purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: NPrice

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, at first, i was not sure if I made the right choice. i was indecisive of which key wifi keyboard should I buy. After I used it for a week, I know my decision was right. In summary, It was a surprise to me how good is the product. the keyboard is very sensitive and no delay on the word show on my mobile phone. Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Typy typy
customer_reviews.text: I keep my laptop on a lift. I needed something so I wasn’t constantly holding my hands in the air. This little keyboard connected fast and works well. I don’t have the problems of they keys repeating like other buyers said. The only thing I don’t like is there doesn’t seem to be an alert when the battery is low.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V Smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing the most important key
customer_reviews.text: Had I known that the keyboard did not have an escape key, I would not have ordered it. I am a software developer, and I use VIM which relies heavily on the escape key. I gave it to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Cay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great key action, easy connectivity
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is exactly what I wanted to use for texting on my phone. If I could change one thing, it would be to add something to the bottom, like a sliding rigid plastic piece that would allow for the keyboard to be used without a flat surface. Because it folds, very nicely and slimly I might add, you cannot use it without a flat surface like a table. Otherwise it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: WOrked for a few day7s
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company was very kind in working with me to issue a full refund for the product without having to return the product. th4e key7baord (which I'm t4y7ping on now) worked for a few day7s and t4hen as y7ou can see, began insert4ing random numbers and somt4imes mult4iple spaces int4o my7 t4ext4. I will be ret4urning it4 for a bet4t4er reviewed produt4.
customer_reviews.author: Lily B

customer_reviews.title: Fails at being a keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Keys must be pressed a certain way to register. It dropped about every 20th character I typed.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Calzone

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard and easy to connect to my MacBook. It is very thin and portable but it is not that ergonomic feel because of it flatness. Good for travel but I switch to MS ergonomic wireless keyboard in office and save this keyboard for travel.
customer_reviews.author: clement tang

customer_reviews.title: Amaze friends and impress others. Flip,this little baby out and act cool.
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a pocket and turns your iPad Pro into a laptop computer. Has functions that aren't on any virtual keyboard. Has issues with connecting via Bluetooth, but what Bluetooth device doesn't?
customer_reviews.author: George CHADICK

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage
customer_reviews.text: Lasted long enough that I could not return it. Bluetooth connection on it is trash. Started off not so great, so I thought I’d give it a chance. Now it doesn’t connect to Bluetooth at all. 32 days after purchase. Never dropped it or damaged it in any way. It’s been sitting on my desk since I received it. Stay away from this trash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good but not great for touch-typists
customer_reviews.text: It's good but not great for touch-typists. The keys sometimes jam or fail to register when you press on them so it's definitely not as good as a typical keyboard on a laptop or a standard sized stand-alone keyboard. So for ease of typing, I'd give it two or three stars. However it is very compact so I give it five stars in that regard. On balance, I'll give it four stars but I will continue to keep my eyes open for a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great phone companion.
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the phone. Turns the smartphone/tablet into a real portable computer. The complaints: - key 6 is on the left side. - right side top keys are size is a bit smaller, takes some time to adjust. - only one device connection If it was programmable with multiple layers - that would be a great board.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is great and very easy to pair and set-up
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard really is ergonomic and removed the strain on my hands when typing for long period. The battery life is great and very easy to pair and set-up. I only wish that there is a easy switch to be able to pair for multiple devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Cabauatan

customer_reviews.title: Best portable keyboard I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is AMAZING. It folds up thin and small and is ready for work on any flat surface. I use it on my iPad mostly but I've connected it to my PC as well. Easy to swap between sources. Good feel (soft touch) and easy to use. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting used to, but it has proved perfect for me - I can put it out of the way to provide extra space, and I can put it out of the way so that the cats don't walk on it. I was constantly amazed at a cat's ability topress just the right keys to turn the display 90 degrees!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion L. Granigan

customer_reviews.title: Sadly this keyboard didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: There were two main issues that made it un-usable for me: The keyboard double typed or missed keystrokes This part is more subjective but, I found having a hinge that never locked didn't work for typing on my lap or soft surfaces like a bed.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: ... don't often post reviews but this little keyboard is amazing!! It allows you to write text or ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't often post reviews but this little keyboard is amazing!! It allows you to write text or email on your phone as if you were writing on a computer. Also, I have an iPhone 5 and it works with that. Every now and then it disconnects from the Bluetooth (which could be due to my ancient phone) but it is easy to reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Jig

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2017 to pair with my iPad and take notes in college classes. It is very light, the ergonomic nature makes it easy to type hike sitting at the class desks. Easy to pair. I only had 1 class per day, but I only needed to charge it about once a week. Several other students asked where I got it. Keys are nearly full sized. I am now using it at home as I work remotely. I would definitely recommend and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for email with the ipad and it works pretty well. It's not a big, full size keyboard so I'm not sure it would be good if you were writing term papers all day but for emails and a little texting, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and functional...except the keys don't all work.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After my initial one-star post, the company sent me a new replacement keyboard free-of charge. I'm boosting my review to 4 stars; not 5 starts since the initial product was faulty but nonetheless, a good product for the $. Really liked the keyboard when I received it. It is compact, easy to use, and the buttons have a nice feel to them. I used it only about 6 times and now the "L" button seems to not work at all when I press it. Quite the disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: All-around awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I mostly work on my laptop (and I work at a couple of different venues throughout the day – cafe, library, office, etc.), and I needed a keyboard that could help me distance my eyes from the laptop screen and provide ergonomic support. While the individual keys are a tad bit tiny (I have very chubby fingers), once you get the hang of it, you will enjoy using the product – it's super lightweight, easy to use, connects well, and features a long battery life – recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MoonSoo Choi

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more so it can keep up
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this because I type too fast for it and I don’t even type over 35 words/min. Too bad. I linked it to my iPad and it could have been useful. I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Bacon

customer_reviews.title: First Impression: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Light weight! Good materials! Works great with iPad Pro! It was better it had a case! I bought a case for my iPad Pro 12.9 and a case for Apple Pencil from MoKo and I am totally satisfied with all these 3 items. Arrived on time. But I’m missing a case for this keyboard! :(
customer_reviews.author: amolaei09

customer_reviews.title: I love how small and compact this keyboard is
customer_reviews.text: I love how small and compact this keyboard is. Unfortunately, it can't be used on my lap, which is where I tend to put my keyboards for comfort. I couldn't find anything that was sturdy enough AND small enough to fit under it comfortably. It would be nice to have an added feature of a board to keep it flat when being used in the car, or other places where there is no flat surface. It wasn't the easiest thing to figure out. But once I figured out the basics, I liked it ok.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: An excellent customer service: my keyboard had a small technical issue, a replacement was offered in no time after I contacted Moko.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for those who need to often do a great deal of writing (typing) on their tablets or Smartphones
customer_reviews.text: Light enough and folds small enough to take along. Internal Lithium battery charge via micro USB lasts for months (closed) and adequately long for hours of use. Keys have good feel and travel. Pairs easily and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas CoffeyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and light weight. The main issue is that often the bluetooth gets disconnected
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Good product! but..
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is amazing, it works as expected. the only downside is that it has a weird angle that makes my fingers forget how to write. also the separation between keys in the middle is hard to get used to. Other than that the materials and quality of the product itself, is nice. I recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and slim. Easy to drop. Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: Lots of finger room. Very useful investment. Would like to say Buy it
customer_reviews.author: James A. Steward

customer_reviews.title: A good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Solid feeling portable keyboard! The keyboard is compact but quite comfortable even though I have large fingers. The build quality is good and it works great with my i devices! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect and use. I use it with my 9.7 inch iPad and my iPhone for occasions where I do not have access to my laptop but need to get some work done. Very easy to adjust to typing on this keyboard and easy to carry with you.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Nice accessory to my ipad
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a person who touch types like I do. Light weight and portable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Waterfall2

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Amazing LiL Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: The ergonomic shape, compact size, effortless bluetooth and magnetic hold make this the most efficient keyboard on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Reade

customer_reviews.title: a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim - I travel a lot for work and have a history with carpal tunnel. It is a game changer. I can even set it on top of the keyboard on my laptop and use it with the mouse that's built in to the laptop. The battery life is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Engelhard

customer_reviews.title: Some of the keys don't work
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea and I had very high hopes, but some of the keys don't work as expected, and you need a lot of pressure in order to get it to type correctly. I am unable to type fluidly on this keyboard and therefore do not use it as I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: As expected, works great.
customer_reviews.text: As expected, works great. Not the most comfortable or easiest keyboard to type on, which you can tell from looking at the pictures, it is a simple, thin keyboard . But it is very portable and reliable, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Very portable which also means very thin and small and not as ergonomic as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I bet this would be an awesome product for someone who is looking for compact and portable. It did feel a bit more fragile than I would've preferred too.
customer_reviews.author: S Chun

customer_reviews.title: Thing works great thus far
customer_reviews.text: Thing works great thus far. Even links up on the Windows login after a couple seconds for the Bluetooth to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Carl W.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. I didn't think the curved nature of the board was going to be an issue, but I find it a bit annoying. But other than that, the quality is great and set up was easy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L F.

customer_reviews.title: Excelente. Works well with all my devises. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Excelente. Works well with all my devises. Just make sure your phone and tablet are not competing for it at the same time. Turn off the Bluetooth on one of them and after it is conected to one, then turn on the other Bluetooth back on and DONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As described. Gotta type the letters with strength, if not, the letter will not show in the document/screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portablw
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and light but I feel like I have really push hard on certain keys. Not good for a main keyboard but if you need something portable then it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: StillWaitingforGodot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, the battery life on it is amazing, and works very well with an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Madrid

customer_reviews.title: A pretty decent portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Received the keyboard today. It was easy to set up but reading the manual won’t hurt and they have info for shorcuts. I first tried it with my iphone 6plus and that worked well, next tried pairing it with my android tablet and that work perfectly well too. On the typing part it runs smoothly. All on all its a pretty decent portable keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Ai

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard I use in my work truck with Surface pro
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it stopped working after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and how portable this is, but sadly after 10 months I cannot get the bluetooth to turn on and pair with my device. Would have given it 5 stars if it did not stop working!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beechler

customer_reviews.title: Closes nicely
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the quality, but the buttons are somewhat soft for my intense typing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for writing on the go!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing! Simple to use, works well and super handy dandy. The only thing that "annoys" me is that it doesn't have a way to lock flat, but that's super minor
customer_reviews.author: unixguy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I must admit I am positively surprised
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I must admit I am positively surprised. I wish it would offer configurable keys (so I could insert smileys with the push of a single key) but I guess other bluetooth keyboards don't offer configurable keys either..
customer_reviews.author: Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Makes it so much faster to text using on my iPhone! Seems to hold the battery a long time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Smalls

customer_reviews.title: it was great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Some of the keys stopped working after 6 months of light use. Before that, it was great while it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Love the ergonomics, light weight, portability. Loses Bluetooth connection occasionally but not enough to be inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: E. olton

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Very small and light. Easy to set up and use, and has very similar positioning to MacBook keys once you get used to the split layout angling your hands differently. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia C Funkenbusch

customer_reviews.title: Best portable keyboard out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best bluetooth keyboard to get! It folds up really small, full size keyboard, battery lasts forever on a single charge, and the keys feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Rolo

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought based on reviews and I am very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to get used to the ergonomic design but I bought based on reviews and I am very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tupper's View

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have large hands and want your fingers to fit the keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ergonomic and size. It the split makes it easy to type with out my hands being right next to each other feeling cramped. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: mommas reading

customer_reviews.title: Fun to type with
customer_reviews.text: Sure makes typing on my phone easier! No more texting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth Hartz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite accessories for iPad and MacBook very portable and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Really like the format and form-factor, the only issue is that it's a mini-sized keyboard, and I have big hands so not a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwen Fleming

customer_reviews.title: The material is good and very portable as you can bring it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: currently, I am having difficult in using the keyboard due to the space between the 2 sets of pads. However, this is a minor adjustment for an end-user. The material is good and very portable as you can bring it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for my iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portable and hand friendly little keyboard. Doesn’t hurt my wrists like my old keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of it. Easy to travel with it. I have been using it with my ipad to edit and write documents.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Klase

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Works great with my iPad Air 3. Setup is strange, but just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good and portable but note very efficient..
customer_reviews.text: It's a good keyboard, the materials look nice although it gets dirty easiy. The delete key is definitely small for someone with short finger reach length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and great for impromptu note taking
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little thing! Portable, efficient, sleek. Turns lots of heads where i work, and great for impromptu note taking.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Brito

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Three words - 'amazing' 'exceeds expectations' After nearly two months keyboard has become 2nd nature in typing. Love the foldable feature, but unfolds to a good size keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baer

customer_reviews.title: Its nicely designed with good quality materials and issue with connecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection issues with window 10, surface pro 3. Its nicely designed with good quality materials and issue with connecting makes not usable. Also, does not have ability to sync two devices at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I like it very much it's handy and useful
customer_reviews.author: daniel fernandez jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like it a lot, very easy to use, very easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. Very compact but comfortable to type on. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a traditionalist typist, keep looking
customer_reviews.text: MoKo makes great keyboards. Do not order this if you are looking for a traditional keyboard layout. Five minutes of this "split board" was enough anxiety for this touch typist. Too innovative for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo York

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: It was too small for my use. I bought it because I don't like the keyboard on laptops, thinking it would be bigger. In reality it was the same size as the keyboard on the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Wagner

customer_reviews.title: dead keys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in april of 2017 and haven't used it very much and now the e and r keys don't work. I love the key board but nto dependable so I I would not buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love !!! Thinking about buying a spare just to keep in my car or purse.
customer_reviews.author: College Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad, bad.
customer_reviews.text: These are awful! 2/3 of them ended up breaking within 2 uses!!! AWFUL PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brehanna Alsin

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard, it works great on my kindle or m you android phone, through Bluetooth. I've had no problem except the battery only lasting about 6 hours of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Thor101370

customer_reviews.title: Very good portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Used the keyboard just a couple of times now, but like it very much. Size is enough to provide comfortable writing, but also very portable especially that you can fold it. Quality seems good overall, no complaints about it, the keys are nice to touch. Had no issues with pairing it with my ipad mini 4, works great, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bartosz

customer_reviews.title: How could I have lived without this?!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little keyboard and it folds up. I couldn’t have asked for a better portable Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product
customer_reviews.text: I like that its compact and automatically connects after the first time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works perfectly. Connects fast and no noticeable input lag.
customer_reviews.author: Atlus Hart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable keyboard option
customer_reviews.text: Extremely slim and portable form factor. Very easy to pair and works everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H

product_meta.title: MoKo Universal Foldable Keyboard, Ultra-Thin Portable Wireless Keyboard for iPad, iPhone, Compatible with iOS, Android and Windows Tablet Devices, Gray
feature_bullets: iOS / Windows / Android COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with 3 major operating system: iOS / Windows/ Android. Supports most Wireless-enabled devices, including All-New iPad 9.7 2017, iPhone 8 / 7 / 7 Plus Red.
ULTRA-THIN & LIGHTWEIGHT: Folded size: 6.2" * 4" * 0.5", unfolded size: 12.9" * 4" * 0.23". Weighs only 176g(6.2 ounces). The innovative, foldable design easily fits into a purse, bag, or pocket.
EASY ON / EASY OFF: The keyboard is automatically turned on when you open it and turned off when you fold it.
RECHARGEABLE: You can charge from any USB port using the included cable.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The full-size keyset provides excellent sense of touch and comfortable typing experience.
